amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete State priority and requirements provisions relating to grant awards by the Secretary of Education of new funds that will be allocated to the States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike provisions in the bill that identify specific priorities for charter school grant funding to states that meet certain requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 260 (Roll no. 610).
